name: ClearRect
description:
ClearRect

A puzzle game where you fit Tetris blocks into a rectangle.

NOTE:

The game is best played downloaded. I think there might be a bug with the rotation of blocks in the browser...

FOR MAC USERS

After downloading, follow the instructions in the last screenshot. Sorry for the inconvenience...
